title: Social Media Utilization Strategies for Nursing and Midwifery Education: Mobile Microlearning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Corporate nursing/midwifery training program emphasizing real-time collaboration and case-based learning via mobile devices

learning_goals: Developing the ability to share and analyze clinical cases using social media platforms (Instagram, LinkedIn, etc.)
Learners can acquire ≥3 professional communication skills through 5-minute microlearning content in mobile environments
Development and submission of a 5-item social media ethics guideline through team-based project evaluation
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
